field.default:
To create a menu item for DEFAULT DISPLAY -configuration- (for all tags that do not have a menu item)
1. Select no tag here
2. Set a generic title/alias e.g. 'tagged' (as alias will be show in the URLs) and configure menu item parameters
3. Go to component parameters, open TAB 'Lists' and select this menu item as default menu item for (category-based view) 'Tagged items'
